summary.span: 表示一个 Word 文档中的托管控件集合，该文档已通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具进行自定义。

span.span: Represents a collection of managed controls on a Word document that has been customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和属性来管理在 Word 文档上的控件。Use the methods and properties to manage controls on a Word document. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). 若要获取对象在文档级项目中，使用属性的`ThisDocument`在项目中的类。To get an object in a document-level project, use the property of the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 若要获取在应用程序级项目中，使用对象属性的在运行时以编程方式创建宿主项。To get an object in an application-level project, use the property of a host item that you create programmatically at run time. 有关更多信息，请参见 [在运行时在 VSTO 外接程序中扩展 Word 文档和 Excel 工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). 下表显示了如何使用成员来执行一些常见的任务与文档上的控件。The following table shows how to use members to perform some common tasks related to controls on documents. |任务Task|操作Action| |----------|------------| |向文档添加控件。Add a control to the document.|使用添加之一*ControlName*方法。Use one of the Add*ControlName* methods. 例如，若要添加内容控件，请使用方法。For example, to add a content control, use the method.| |从文档中移除的控件。Remove a control from the document.|使用 方法。Use the method.| |确定控件是否在集合中。Determine whether a control is in the collection.|将控件或其名称传递方法。Pass the control or its name to the method.| |获取集合中的控件的索引。Get the index of a control in the collection.|将控件或其名称传递方法。Pass the control or its name to the method.| |从集合中获取一个控件。Get a control from the collection.|传递的索引或名称，该控件的属性。Pass the index or name of the control to the property.| [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加一个新在运行时在文档中当前选定的位置。Use this method to add a new at the current selection in the document at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新到文档开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示提供的 Microsoft Office Word 的等式构建基块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 此版本是文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`类中，你的项目，并调用`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`类中，你的项目，并调用`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加一个新基于文档中的本机内容控件。Use this method to add a new that is based on a native content control in the document. 这是有用的在创建时在运行时，并且你想要在下次打开该文档时重新创建相同的控件。This is useful when you create a at run time, and you want to recreate the same control the next time the document is opened. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新为已在文档中每个本机构建基块库。The following code example creates a new for every native building block gallery that is already in the document. 此版本是文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`类中，你的项目，并调用`CreateBuildingBlockControlsFromNativeControls`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `CreateBuildingBlockControlsFromNativeControls` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#3)] 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`类中外, 接程序项目，并调用`CreateBuildingBlockControlsFromNativeControls`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your add-in project, and call the `CreateBuildingBlockControlsFromNativeControls` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例创建一个新为每个用户添加到文档的本机构建基块库。The following code example creates a new for every native building block gallery that the user adds to the document. 此版本是文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`在项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于 C#，则还必须附加`ThisDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序事件的`ThisDocument`类。For C#, you must also attach the `ThisDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the event of the `ThisDocument` class. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#4)] 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`在项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project. 此外，您必须将附加`ActiveDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序活动文档的事件。Also, you must attach the `ActiveDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the event of the active document. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#4)]

[!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#102](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/ComboBox.cs#102)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#102](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/ComboBox.vb#102)] 下面的代码示例创建一个新为每个用户添加到文档的本机组合框。The following code example creates a new for every native combo box that the user adds to the document. 此版本是文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`在项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于 C#，则还必须附加`ThisDocument_ComboBoxContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序事件的`ThisDocument`类。For C#, you must also attach the `ThisDocument_ComboBoxContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the event of the `ThisDocument` class. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#103](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/ComboBox.cs#103)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#103](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/ComboBox.vb#103)] 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`在项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project. 此外，您必须将附加`ActiveDocument_ComboBoxContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序活动文档的事件。Also, you must attach the `ActiveDocument_ComboBoxContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the event of the active document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加一个新，基于在运行时在文档中的本机内容控件。Use this method to add a new that is based on a native content control in the document at run time. 这是有用的在创建时在运行时，并且你想要在下次打开该文档时重新创建相同的控件。This is useful when you create a at run time, and you want to recreate the same control the next time the document is opened. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新为文档中的每个本机组控件。The following code example creates a new for every native group control that is in the document. 此版本是文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`类中，你的项目，并调用`CreateGroupControlsFromNativeControls`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `CreateGroupControlsFromNativeControls` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#402](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/Group.cs#402)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#402](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/Group.vb#402)] 下面的代码示例创建一个新为每个用户添加到文档的本机组控件。The following code example creates a new for every native group control that the user adds to the document. 此版本是文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`在项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于 C#，则还必须附加`ThisDocument_GroupContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序事件的`ThisDocument`类。For C#, you must also attach the `ThisDocument_GroupContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the event of the `ThisDocument` class. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#403](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/Group.cs#403)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#403](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/Group.vb#403)] 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`在项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project. 此外，您必须将附加`ActiveDocument_GroupContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序活动文档的事件。Also, you must attach the `ActiveDocument_GroupContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the event of the active document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加一个新，基于在运行时在文档中的本机内容控件。Use this method to add a new that is based on a native content control in the document at run time. 这是有用的在创建时在运行时，并且你想要在下次打开该文档时重新创建相同的控件。This is useful when you create a at run time, and you want to recreate the same control the next time the document is opened. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新为文档中的每个本机纯文本控件。The following code example creates a new for every native plain text control that is in the document. 此版本是文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`类中，你的项目，并调用`CreateTextControlsFromNativeControls`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `CreateTextControlsFromNativeControls` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method.
